posts.post_title: FS - Turkey Reds, Cobb, Mathewson, Johnson
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell some of my T3 duplicates.  Will provide any other pictures that are requested or answer any questions.  Lot for $675.00.



Ed Walsh - PSA 2 - Turkey Red back - $300
Mickey Doolan - SGC 10 - checklist back - $80
Addie Joss - ungraded - checklist back - tack holes, clean back, no paperless - SOLD
Sam Crawford - ungraded - minor tape on back - $300
Donovan - minor paperloss on front, heavy loss on back - $70
Murray - rounded corner and paperless on back corners from glue - $60
Trying to Catch Him Napping - poor condition - $50
Safe At Third - poor condition - $50

r/
Frank
